Text: Book one has page numbers from 1 to 218 randomly scattered throughout the text.  The rest of the books are perfect, as far as I can tell.
Yeah, I couldn't remove the numbers, even through different converters. And epub files are a bit sticky for managing! So just ignore the numbers people, and sorry for any inconvenience!
I hate that you can't remove these through converters, it seems like such a no-brainer.  The only way I know how is to convert to RTF, remove manually, and reconvert to epub.  It takes ages though.
I know! It seems like such an easy feature, compared to all the advanced features converters and managers (like Calibre) seem to have.
